title: Paper Bowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Flame Breath**: Rampage attack a target with no other special effects, Can only be used on night 3, 6, 9 and so on.
- **Wish** (2x): Use the Star rod to give a Koopa Overprotective and Lynchproof defense until the start of the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone attacking Koopas affected by **Wish** be dealt a Basic attack if they aren't from your Faction.
- Roleblock Immunity while Breathing flames.
- Gain 1 **Wish** ammo at the start of day 5.

desc:
Post 1803
*But today, your pathetic little attacks won't beat me! Take a look at this! Look at what I stole from Star Haven! It's the Star Rod!*
